body_html:
Some performance profiling (e.g. with pprof: https://github.com/google/pprof) needs to be done for extract_image_patches and the transpose in the gradient op for the mentioned input sizes (preferably with two standalone benchmarks respectively for extract_image_patches's gradient op and transpose), in order to identify the slow part of the code and to suggest a potential fix.

Marking this as contribution welcome for now.

Marking this as contribution welcome for now.
body:
Some performance profiling (e.g. with pprof: https://github.com/google/pprof) needs to be done for extract_image_patches and the transpose in the gradient op for the mentioned input sizes (preferably with two standalone benchmarks respectively for extract_image_patches's gradient op and transpose), in order to identify the slow part of the code and to suggest a potential fix.

Marking this as contribution welcome for now.
